name: wolrc
short_description: This tiny script listens for WOL (wake on LAN) packets. Depending on the amount received without a certain timeout reached it will perform predefined tasks. Toggling the purpose of your home theater pc for example can become quite easy this way.
summary: Remote control your linux box via WOL
